body:
People leave because they don't know what direction they will go in.

Since they have to go right or left, some choose left over the right thing to do.


Please no more leavings, carrie_may broke my heart from leaving.
body_tagged:

Please no more leavings, carrie_may broke my heart from leaving.
title: Why people leave.

replies.body:
Or people leave because they know exactly what they need to do, which is normally to focus on their lives :P

Real Life > Minecraft all day everyday.
replies.body_tagged:
Or people leave because they know exactly what they need to do, which is normally to focus on their lives :P

Real Life > Minecraft all day everyday.

replies.body:
People can't stay forever.

One day you will have to quit Minecraft, whether it be for college, a job, high school, whatever.

People leave when they feel they have to.
replies.body_tagged:
People can't stay forever.

One day you will have to quit Minecraft, whether it be for college, a job, high school, whatever.

People leave when they feel they have to.

replies.body: People burn out, too much playing will just burn you out and not make it fun anymore, I was burned out for about 8 months
replies.body_tagged: People burn out, too much playing will just burn you out and not make it fun anymore, I was burned out for about 8 months

replies.body: A lot of people need a break of minecraft sometime (I do) but it's not something that you can leave that easy if you are young
replies.body_tagged: A lot of people need a break of minecraft sometime (I do) but it's not something that you can leave that easy if you are young

replies.body: I know how they feel. Most of the time its that they are bored or people have drove them out. Im thinking about leaving so I know why......

replies.body: No one misses FTW more than I do :<

replies.body: If you decide to play this block game for your whole life, skipping college, skipping school, there has to be something wrong with you. I've already grown addiction to this game. Minecraft is like a drug. You need to quit while you can.
replies.body_tagged: If you decide to play this block game for your whole life, skipping college, skipping school, there has to be something wrong with you. I've already grown addiction to this game. Minecraft is like a drug. You need to quit while you can.

replies.body:
Well i am only here to collect players.
And introduce them to my community(not really mine though :( )
and then recruit them and making them my soldiers lol.
I wish i could have ericv4 on our sides.
he should be a great mod.



and yeah i come and go to.

replies.body: People leave because they are tired of waiting for something OverHyped, like me.
